revised_title: Intensity Distributions in Molecular Spectra: The Swan System of Carbon
tldr: This study investigates the intensity distributions in molecular spectra, specifically the Swan system of carbon molecules. The authors, R. C. Johnson, N. R. Tawde, and E. V. Appleton, analyze the spectral lines and provide a mathematical explanation for the observed intensity variations. Their work contributes to the understanding of molecular spectra and the application of quantum mechanics in chemistry.
